channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for DE
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for DE

item.title: Report X-2024030714
item.description:
Report X-2024030714

Identified by scraper @ 2024-03-22T18:13:56+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-03-07
  • City: NEW CASTLE
  • State: DE
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Customer loaded trailer pickup to 181 station, pkg arrived at 197 wand was unloaded following non-haz procedures, due to pkg not being marked as HAZ. pkg was conveyed.Â PKG Handler discovered pkg on conveyor that was releasing vapors and contacted mgmt. QA team collected and isolated. Began spill containment procedures. Drummed and placed under fume hood. DescribePack: Inner bottle lacking cap, contents compromised fiberboard box, box disintegrated. DurationRel: 6 and MitigateEffect: fume hood, and Haz drum containment, corrosive fluid neutralization powder.
